Purpose

The purpose of this privacy policy (this “Privacy Policy”) is to inform users of our Site of the following:

  1. The personal data we will collect;
  2. Use of collected data;
  3. Who has access to the data collected;
  4. The rights of Site users.

This Privacy Policy applies in addition to the terms and conditions of our Site.

Consent

By using our Site, users agree that they consent to:

  1. The conditions set out in this Privacy Policy; and
  2. The collection, use, and retention of the data listed in this Privacy Policy.

Personal Data We Collect

Data Collected Automatically

  • Location.

Data Collected in a Non-Automatic Way

  • Email address.

This data may be collected when creating an account or interacting with the app.

How We Use Personal Data

Data collected on our Site will only be used for the purposes specified in this Privacy Policy.

  • Automatically collected data: Statistics.
  • User-submitted data: Communication and product personalization.

Who We Share Personal Data With

Employees

We may disclose user data to any member of our organization who reasonably needs access to achieve the purposes set out in this Privacy Policy.

Other Disclosures

  • If the law requires it;
  • If required for legal proceedings;
  • To prove or protect our legal rights; and
  • To buyers or potential buyers of the company.

How Long We Store Personal Data

User data is stored until the purpose for which it was collected has been achieved.

How We Protect Your Personal Data

  • Data Encryption: HTTPS (SSL/TLS) in transit.
  • Firebase Security: Encryption at rest and in transit.
  • Authentication & Access Control: Role-based access for authorized personnel only.
  • Monitoring: Regular reviews and incident response.
  • User Control: Users may request deletion or modification.
  • Compliance: We aim to follow applicable regulations (e.g., GDPR/CCPA).

While we take reasonable precautions, the Internet can be insecure and we cannot guarantee absolute security.

Children

We do not knowingly collect or use personal data from children under 13. If such data is identified, it will be deleted as soon as possible.

How to Access, Modify, Delete, or Challenge the Data Collected

Do Not Track Notice

We do not track users over time and across third-party websites and therefore do not respond to DNT signals.

Modifications
